(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB finally))
    (VP (VBD managed)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB eat)
            (NP (DT the) (JJ famous) (NNP Zhen) (NNP Zhen) (NN porridge))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(managed-3, I-1)
advmod(managed-3, finally-2)
root(ROOT-0, managed-3)
aux(eat-5, to-4)
xcomp(managed-3, eat-5)
det(porridge-10, the-6)
amod(porridge-10, famous-7)
nn(porridge-10, Zhen-8)
nn(porridge-10, Zhen-9)
dobj(eat-5, porridge-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (JJ distinctive) (NN feature))
      (PP (IN about)
        (NP (DT this) (NN porridge))))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (SBAR (IN that)
        (S
          (NP (PRP they))
          (VP (VB cook)
            (NP (DT the) (NNS grains))
            (SBAR (IN until)
              (S
                (NP (PRP it))
                (VP (VBZ has)
                  (ADVP (DT all)
                    (CC but))
                  (VP (VBN dissolved)))))))))
    (. .)))


det(feature-3, The-1)
amod(feature-3, distinctive-2)
nsubj(is-7, feature-3)
prep(feature-3, about-4)
det(porridge-6, this-5)
pobj(about-4, porridge-6)
root(ROOT-0, is-7)
mark(cook-10, that-8)
nsubj(cook-10, they-9)
ccomp(is-7, cook-10)
det(grains-12, the-11)
dobj(cook-10, grains-12)
mark(dissolved-18, until-13)
nsubj(dissolved-18, it-14)
aux(dissolved-18, has-15)
dep(but-17, all-16)
advmod(dissolved-18, but-17)
advcl(cook-10, dissolved-18)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (NNS Lots))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (NNS people))))
    (ADVP (RB actually))
    (VP (VB rave)
      (UCP
        (PP (IN about)
          (NP (DT this) (NN porridge)))
        (CC and)
        (SBAR (RB even)
          (S
            (NP (PRP they))
            (ADVP (RB even))
            (VP (VBD got)
              (NP (CD 6) (NNS chopsticks))
              (PP (IN from)
                (NP
                  (NP (NNP Makansutra))
                  (SBAR
                    (WHNP (WDT which))
                    (S
                      (VP (VBZ is)
                        (NP (JJ full) (NNS marks))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(rave-5, Lots-1)
prep(Lots-1, of-2)
pobj(of-2, people-3)
advmod(rave-5, actually-4)
root(ROOT-0, rave-5)
dep(rave-5, about-6)
det(porridge-8, this-7)
pobj(about-6, porridge-8)
cc(about-6, and-9)
advmod(got-13, even-10)
nsubj(got-13, they-11)
advmod(got-13, even-12)
conj(about-6, got-13)
num(chopsticks-15, 6-14)
dobj(got-13, chopsticks-15)
prep(got-13, from-16)
pobj(from-16, Makansutra-17)
nsubj(marks-21, which-18)
cop(marks-21, is-19)
amod(marks-21, full-20)
rcmod(Makansutra-17, marks-21)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (ADVP (RB however))
      (ADJP
        (NP (DT a) (RB little))
        (JJ ambivalent)
        (PP (IN about)
          (NP (PRP it))))
      (SBAR (IN as)
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBD felt)
            (SBAR
              (S
                (NP (PRP it))
                (VP (VBD was)
                  (ADJP (RB almost)
                    (PP (IN like)
                      (S
                        (VP (VBG eating)
                          (NP
                            (NP (DT a) (NN bowl))
                            (PP (IN of)
                              (NP (JJ thickened) (NN cream) (NN soup)))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(ambivalent-6, I-1)
cop(ambivalent-6, was-2)
advmod(ambivalent-6, however-3)
det(little-5, a-4)
npadvmod(ambivalent-6, little-5)
root(ROOT-0, ambivalent-6)
prep(ambivalent-6, about-7)
pobj(about-7, it-8)
mark(felt-11, as-9)
nsubj(felt-11, I-10)
advcl(ambivalent-6, felt-11)
nsubj(almost-14, it-12)
cop(almost-14, was-13)
ccomp(felt-11, almost-14)
prep(almost-14, like-15)
pcomp(like-15, eating-16)
det(bowl-18, a-17)
dobj(eating-16, bowl-18)
prep(bowl-18, of-19)
amod(soup-22, thickened-20)
nn(soup-22, cream-21)
pobj(of-19, soup-22)
